mapper.select: SELECT pro_act.id, aisle.mac_id, aisle.`name` AS product_name, aisle.product_id, act.activity_type, act.`NAME` AS activity_name, CASE WHEN pro_act.id IS NULL THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS is_ref FROM ( SELECT a.mac_id, a.product_id, f.`name` FROM food_machine_aisle a, food_product f WHERE a.product_id = f.id AND a.mac_id = #{macId} ) aisle LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM food_machine_pro_activity_ref r WHERE mac_id = #{macId} ) pro_act ON aisle.mac_id = pro_act.mac_id AND aisle.product_id = pro_act.product_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT 1 activity_type, NAME, `use` FROM operate_activity_first_order where `use` = 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 activity_type, NAME, `use` FROM operate_activity_keep_discount where `use` = 1 UNION ALL SELECT 3 activity_type, NAME, `use` FROM operate_activity_pay_cash_back where `use` = 1 ) act ON pro_act.activity_type = act.activity_type
